com.treatment

Class RoomControler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.treatment.RoomControler

  • public class RoomControler
extends java.lang.Object
    RoomControler class contains all functions needed to certify the information sent by the user to the Chambre Object
    This class contains 6 public functions and 5 private functions
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    C.DEBAISIEUX

      static void ableActionOnJRadio(javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompanyingRButton, javax.swing.JComboBox lengthOfStayTypeSelection, javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withRoomRButton, javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField, javax.swing.JButton showRoomButton, javax.swing.JButton bookingRoomButton, javax.swing.JButton deleteBookingRoomButton)
      This function enable the following parameter This action is activated if the user want to book a room To select "Non" next to "reservation" to put the following parameter in disable mode
      private static boolean checkUpJComboBoxInput(javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
      If the index selected in the JComboVBox is over 0 The boolean fieldOk is set on true
      private static boolean checkUpJDateChooserDateInput(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
      In a try / catch block the date selected in the JDateChooser field is stored in a Date Object If the Date isn't null boolean fieldOk is set on true if an error occurs, the catch block set the examination date to default date at today
      private static boolean checkUpJRadioButtonInput(javax.swing.JRadioButton JR1, javax.swing.JRadioButton JR2)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
      Those two JRadioButton are member of a same ButtonGroup, it doesn't allow them to have the same value If those two have the same value so no selection has been done by the user FieldOk is set on false
      private static boolean checkUpJTextFieldIntInput(javax.swing.JTextField text)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
      If the text is null or void An error message is sent to the user , fieldOk is set on false If the ExceptionControler.numericException return true The information isn't correct the boolean fieldOk is set on false An error message is sent to the user
      static void disableActionOnJRadio(javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompanyingRButton, javax.swing.JComboBox lengthOfStayTypeSelection, javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton, javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField, javax.swing.JButton showRoomButton, javax.swing.JButton bookingRoomButton, javax.swing.JButton deleteBookingRoomButton)
      This function disable the following parameter This action is activated if the user don't want to book a room In this case the only available Button is the one needed to validate the choice To select "Oui" next to "reservation" to put the following parameter back to enable mode
      private static boolean ifExist(javax.swing.JTextField text)
      This function check the room number Usually the following parameter is disable This function is used if an error with the settings occurs It certify that the number selected is one selectable after the choices made by the user
      static boolean inputFieldControlerBeforeRoomBooking(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField, javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user are corrects
      Three different functions are used If all the functions return true so the boolean fieldOk keep is status on true
      static boolean inputFieldControlerBeforeRoomSelection(javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withRoomRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user are corrects

      • inputFieldControlerGlobalCheckUp

        public static boolean inputFieldControlerGlobalCheckUp(javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton,
                                                       javax.swing.JRadioButton withRoomRButton,
                                                       javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField,
                                                       javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton,
                                                       javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompangyingRButton,
                                                       javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox,
                                                       com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField,
                                                       com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField,
                                                       javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user are corrects
        Six different functions are used If all the functions return true so the boolean fieldOk keep is status on true
        Parameters:
        withoutRoomRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        withRoomRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField - : store the id of the Patient for whom the Examen has been registered
        withAccompangyingRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        withoutAccompangyingRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        LengthOfStaySelectionBox - : several values are available for the user to select
        entryDateField - : the user can choose the entry date from a pre determined range
        releaseDateField - : the minimum available release date is set to be the current date
        bedRoomNumberField - : store the number allocated for a specific room
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
        See Also:
        checkUpJRadioButtonInput(JRadioButton, JRadioButton), checkUpJTextFieldIntInput(JTextField), checkUpJComboBoxInput(JComboBox), checkUpJDateChooserDateInput(JDateChooser), checkUpJTextFieldIntInput(JTextField), ifExist(JTextField)

                                                            javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user are corrects

        Parameters:
        withoutRoomRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        withRoomRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField - : store the id of the Patient for whom the Examen has been registered
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
        See Also:

      • inputFieldControlerBeforeRoomBooking

        public static boolean inputFieldControlerBeforeRoomBooking(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField,
                                                           com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField,
                                                           javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user are corrects
        Three different functions are used If all the functions return true so the boolean fieldOk keep is status on true
        Parameters:
        entryDateField - : the user can choose the entry date from a pre determined range
        releaseDateField - : the minimum available release date is set to be the current date
        bedRoomNumberField - : store the number allocated for a specific room

      • checkUpJRadioButtonInput

        private static boolean checkUpJRadioButtonInput(javax.swing.JRadioButton JR1,
                                                javax.swing.JRadioButton JR2)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
        Those two JRadioButton are member of a same ButtonGroup, it doesn't allow them to have the same value If those two have the same value so no selection has been done by the user FieldOk is set on false
        Parameters:
        JR1 - : a JRadioButton with a specific boolean value
        JR2 - : a JRadioButton with a specific boolean value
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean

      • checkUpJComboBoxInput

        private static boolean checkUpJComboBoxInput(javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
        If the index selected in the JComboVBox is over 0 The boolean fieldOk is set on true
        Parameters:
        LengthOfStaySelectionBox - : several values are available for the user to select
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean

      • checkUpJTextFieldIntInput

        private static boolean checkUpJTextFieldIntInput(javax.swing.JTextField text)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
        If the text is null or void An error message is sent to the user , fieldOk is set on false If the ExceptionControler.numericException return true The information isn't correct the boolean fieldOk is set on false An error message is sent to the user
        Parameters:
        text - : a String information written by the user
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
        See Also:
        ExceptionControler.numericException(JTextField)

      • checkUpJDateChooserDateInput

        private static boolean checkUpJDateChooserDateInput(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
        In a try / catch block the date selected in the JDateChooser field is stored in a Date Object If the Date isn't null boolean fieldOk is set on true if an error occurs, the catch block set the examination date to default date at today
        Parameters:
        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean

      • disableActionOnJRadio

        public static void disableActionOnJRadio(javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompanyingRButton,
                                         javax.swing.JComboBox lengthOfStayTypeSelection,
                                         javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton,
                                         javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton,
                                         javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField,
                                         com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField,
                                         com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField,
                                         javax.swing.JButton showRoomButton,
                                         javax.swing.JButton bookingRoomButton,
                                         javax.swing.JButton deleteBookingRoomButton)
        This function disable the following parameter This action is activated if the user don't want to book a room In this case the only available Button is the one needed to validate the choice To select "Oui" next to "reservation" to put the following parameter back to enable mode
        Parameters:
        withoutRoomRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        LengthOfStaySelectionBox - : several values are available for the user to select
        withAccompangyingRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        withoutRoomRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        bedRoomNumberField - : store the number allocated for a specific room
        entryDateField - : the user can choose the entry date from a pre determined range
        releaseDateField - : the minimum available release date is set to be the current date
        showRoomButton - : button activation the functions needed to show the available Chambre Object from the user's selection
        bookingRoomButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        deleteBookingRoomButton - : button activating the functions needed to delete a Chambre Object

      • ifExist

        private static boolean ifExist(javax.swing.JTextField text)
        This function check the room number Usually the following parameter is disable This function is used if an error with the settings occurs It certify that the number selected is one selectable after the choices made by the user
        Parameters:
        text - : a String information writen by the user
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
